ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: Not exactly. Read the game statement on the box and website .... ... or if you want to play a greedy merchant, all are possible in Everquest. Now what kind
ygData.messageBody:
Not exactly. Read the game statement on the box and website ....
"... or if you want to play a greedy merchant, all are possible in Everquest."

Now what kind of greedy merchant cant even sell his wares??

I have read NO other true statements from them about profit or not profit. But then again, I guess
their actions with these patches speak louder than words.

-Haytred


Aaron Braunstein wrote:

> From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
>
> >From: "robert nunez" <homenunez@...>
> >
> >Man r u serious?
> > Why are they doing this thing?Do they not realize that we take on these
> >skills which not only take s a ton away from time away from hunting but now
> >these skills are just a complete waste of time
>
> That's the point... kind of. Verant has always said from the
> beginning that they do not want trade skills to be profitable when
> you sell your wares back to the NPC vendors.
>
> --
